name: Guard of Wonderland VR
description: Guard of Wonderland is an interactive visual novel in virtual reality created from our inspirations of Alice in Wonderland.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290, equivalent or better. Storage: 1762 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290, equivalent or better. Storage: 1762 MB available space
